Description_lang: Increases Khadgar's armor as well as his threat. Causes $34913s1 Fire damage when hit, increases chance to critically hit with spells by $s3%, and reduces the chance of being critically hit by $s2%.
AuraDescription_lang: Increases Khadgar's armor as well as his threat. Causes $35916s1 Fire damage to attackers.  Chance to receive a critical hit reduced by $s2%.  Chance to critically strike with spells increased by $s3%.
